text: Amblytylus is a genus of plant bugs in the family Miridae. There are at least two described species in Amblytylus. Amblytylus nasutus ==Species== * Amblytylus albidus (Hahn, 1834) * Amblytylus nasutus (Kirschbaum, 1856) ==References== ==Further reading== * * * Category:Phylinae
title: Amblytylus
